msg.msgText: "Queue" monitoring data, can be obtained using the "imaserver stat Queue" command. SYNTAX: imaserver stat Queue help imaserver stat Queue ["Name=value"] ["ResultCount=value"] "StatType=value" ["FilePrefix=value"] EXAMPLE: imaserver stat Queue "ResultCount=50" "StatType=BufferedMsgsLowest" The valid options are: Name Queue name. Asterisk matches 0 or more characters. The default value is *. ResultCount Number of returned results. The valid options are 10,25,50,100. The default value is 25. StatType The sort order in which results will be returned. Specify from one of the following StatTypes: The default StatType is "BufferedMsgsHighest" BufferedMsgsHighest BufferedMsgsLowest BufferedPercentHighest BufferedPercentLowest BufferedHWMPercentHighest BufferedHWMPercentLowest ProducedMsgsHighest ProducedMsgsLowest ConsumedMsgsHighest ConsumedMsgsLowest ConsumersHighest ConsumersLowest ProducersHighest ProducersLowest ExpiredMsgsHighest ExpiredMsgsLowest FilePrefix The prefix of the .CSV file that the result is saved to. The file name contains the prefix, process ID, and timestamp. If FilePrefix is not specified, then the result is displayed on the console. NOTES: 1. Options are specified as "key=value" pairs. 2. All "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
